title: Many artistes can’t combine school and music like I did - Deshinor - Vanguard News
text:
Home » Entertainment » Music » Many artistes can’t combine school and music like I did – Deshinor Many artistes can’t combine school and music like I did – Deshinor On 10:28 pm In Music by adekunle Comments 
By Rotimi Agbana BUDDING Afro-pop/highlife singer, Deshinor, has revealed his readiness to take the Nigerian music industry by storm now that he is done with his education at the University of Lagos, Akoka. In a brief chat with E-Daily , the talented Mass Communication graduate expressed excitement on becoming a graduate. Deshinor 
“To be honest it is a blessing, not a lot of artists are able to combine classes and music making. I’m genuinely happy at starting a new phase of my life, which is to focus on my career as a musician and make the best out of it” Deshinor boasted. The multi-talented singer, who released his debut single, New Wave, after being signed on to Matt Westside Records in 2016, boasts that he is now ready to take on his career full time after struggling with balancing education and music making. adekunle
